channel.title: Cohen-Macaulay curve on Roberta's Personal Web Page
channel.description: Recent content in Cohen-Macaulay curve on Roberta's Personal Web Page

item.title: A combinatorial description of finite O-sequences and aCM genera
item.description: Abstract. The goal of this paper is to explicitly detect all the arithmetic genera of arithmetically Cohen–Macaulay projective curves with a given degree $d$. It is well-known that the arithmetic genus $g$ of a curve $C$ can be easily deduced from the $h$-vector of the curve; in the case where $C$ is arithmetically Cohen–Macaulay of degree $d$, $g$ must belong to the range of integers $\left\{0,\ldots,\binom{d-1}{2}\right\}$. We develop an algorithmic procedure that allows one to avoid constructing most of the possible $h$-vectors of $C$.
